  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_94325</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_94325</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Le mouvement du soleil et des étoiles</string>
            <string language="en">Sun and stars movement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne und Sternbewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sol e movimento das estrelas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Sole e movimento delle stelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ήλιος και μετακίνηση αστεριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sol y movimiento de las estrellas</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre le modèle actuel du  mouvement du soleil et des étoiles relativement à la terre.  La terre fait un tour sur elle-même une fois par jour tandis que le soleil restent immobiles.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the present model of the movement of the Sun and stars relative to the Earth. Earth spins round once each day as the Sun and stars stand still.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">jour</string>
            <string language="en">Day</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">la terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">mouvement</string>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rotation</string>
            <string language="en">spin</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">étoile</string>
            <string language="en">star</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sun</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das anwesende Modell der 
Bewegung der Sonne und der Sterne im Verhältnis zu der Masse. 
Masse spinnt um, sobald jeder Tag als die Sonne und Sterne noch 
stehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o modelo atual do 
movimento do sol e das estrelas relativo à terra. A terra gira 
round uma vez que cada dia como o sol e as estrelas estão ainda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il modello attuale 
del movimento del sole e delle stelle riguardante la terra. La 
terra fila in tondo una volta che ogni giorno come il sole e le stelle
stanno fermo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει παρόν μοντέλο της 
μετακίνησης του ήλιου και των αστεριών σχετικά με τη γη. 
Κύκλος γήινων περιστροφών μόλις σταθούν ακόμα κάθε ημέρα
ως ήλιος και τα αστέρια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el actual modelo del 
movimiento del sol y de las estrellas concerniente a la tierra. 
La tierra hace girar alrededor una vez que cada día como el sol
y las estrellas todavía estén parado.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tag</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drehbeschleunigung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stern</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento</string>
          </keyword>
